评论详情: I love these so much that I lost one of them on a trip to Mexico and had to order more! They are so cute, good quality, and I get SO many compliments! I have the medium size woven through my 1st and 2nd piercing on both ears!

评论概述: Inaccurate listing— won’t get what you buy
评论详情: I bought the 3 pair listing with different sizes, and while the ones I received are nice, I only received one pair. Be aware that you will only get one pair when buying the 3 pair set. Very disappointed.

I bought this set at least four or five years ago and are my everyday staple earrings. I love how much creative freedom that threader earrings give and this is a good variety of three different lengths. I mainly use the shortest ones and the mid length ones and save the extra long ones for special occasions. I should also note that these have never tarnished at all either, though my skin chemistry has never made my silver jewelry prone to tarnishing. I've lost a couple of these over the years due to misplacment (they do not fall out of my ears) and I'll probably be ordering another set in the future. People always compliment them and they have become an integral part of my signature style. Buy a set and get creative.
Love these threaders,  nice and sparkly.  Able to sleep in them too !

They sadly don't stay in place for I don't use backs cause I like each end to dangle. But once my ear heals up I can switch my studs for these and wrap them around my ear. They haven't tarnished I keep them in I shower with them and they are holding up.

评论概述: Listing said 3 pairs got one tiny pair only
评论详情: The post for item states 3 pairs I only got one tiny one. I bought for the medium & long lengths so I can't use these at all. Refund me or ship me out the other 2 pairs. Dont even deserve one star it's all I can give tho. Can't stand lying sells ads.
They're so incredibly tiny.
The product was exactly what I was expecting and the material is of good quality. They are the perfect length and fit nicely.
I love these!! Only complaint is that they tarnish incredibly fast.
Did not like as much. Hard to keep in place for me.

评论概述: Just what I was looking for
评论详情: Nice chain to run threw all my ear piercings
I get so many compliments on these earrings! The only reason I didn’t give them 5 stars is because the first set I ordered broke almost immediately. The second pair is holding up well.
Easy to use and in so many different ways
I really love these chain earrings, so light and easy to sleep in. I like the silver better for myself but I bought the gold also.
I love these

First I wan to say I love these threader earrings I have different sizes of the plain Gold Plated chain, they are comfortable to wear and look so pretty. They do not tarnish, I have been wearing my other ones day & night. This pair that I had order on Jan 2nd and arrived on Jan 5th were 3.5 inches in length but when I opened the box it was missing an earring. I contacted the company and notified them. I asked that they send 1 earring to replace the one that was missing. They wanted me to return the 1 earring so it could be replaced with a full set. Let me say, I am very handicapped and in a wheelchair and it is very difficult to go and return them. I explained that to them several times in messaging them how difficult that would be. After many conversations with the company, finally the company came though my package was delivered Feb 20th. They actually sent me a full set. I had almost given up on them because their understanding what I was trying to get across wasn't an easy task. English is not their 1st language, they even mentioned in their communications that they are not US based. For the product I give 5 stars for communications with the company I give 2 starts. So I split the difference and gave them 3 starts. The price is very reasonable for the quality you are getting, as I stated before they don't tarnish after showering and sleeping in them. I will purchase from them again as I do love their earrings, I just wish they had better quality control and better communication skills.
Much smaller than I thought and the bar on both ends is straight so you  can't position the bar on your earlobe

I have double piercing and have to wear earrings often or my piercings will grow shut. I can't stand wearing post earrings to bed because the posts stab my head behind my ear lobes. These threaders can be looped through both holes and have no posts so there's nothing to stab me. I even sleep in them. Wear a different length in each hole for a layered look.

I ordered the three sizes of threader earrings.  I am currently wearing the longest in the set.  It's long enough to thread through all three of my piercings; which is what I wanted.  My only complaint is that the chain portion of the earring is noticeably thinner and more delicate than any of the other threader earrings I own.  As you can see in the picture, the thicker chain is more the standard I'm used to seeing.  They are pretty, but harder to see at a distance than the thicker chains.  That being said, I still like them and will wear them.
I got the black ones , unfortunately the color came off very quicly.
I love the way these look. I have multiple piercings in my ears, and I threaded these through multiple holes with no issues. I even threaded them through my cartilage with no issues.
These are so cute and versatile. I can wear them wrapped around my lobe or weaved in. They are comfortable and light. Well made!
Nice light weight earrins. Love the two inch ones best. Wish the ball had been slightly larger. Highly recommend

I have ordered these more than once...they are awesome!! Yes, I occasionally lose one or the other, however, compared to other threaders not as often. Love these and will continue to reorder as necessary.
Super tiny.. would perfer to be more visible

Would be willing to spend more and buy again if they were made with a little more care. Tbh would still repurchase them way they are if I lost them.

They're perfect!  I have multiple ear piercings, and wear several earrings at the same time.  I ADORE threader earrings, and these are no exception.  They are lightweight, comfortable, and shimmer in the light.  They came nicely boxed and packaged well within the box, and there was a polishing cloth included.  Totally satisfied with this purchase, and would not hesitate to order again

评论概述: No regrets with these dangling earrings!
评论详情: Super happy with these earrings! Exactly what I wanted. Very lightweight, comfortable and attractive.  I'm ordering another 2 sets because of my numerous ear piercings.  They dangle like a waterfall!

评论概述: Must have for dainty jewelry lovers!!!!
评论详情: Love love love! These are my new favorite earrings!! They’re so cute and dainty, and I love being able to use different lengths with different piercings in my ear! I have a double cartilage and the longer one is great for wrapping around my ear to give the appearance of a hoop, while also still having the dangling aspect. They are also great quality for the price. I’ve left them in for weeks at a time and they haven’t changed color at all. They’ve lasted through many showers, working out, etc. I definitely recommend these earrings, especially for those with multiple ear piercings!
I have super sensitive skin, so wearing any fake jewelry irritates it - most especially earrings. But these are SUPER cute and extremely light, so I’m going to wear them when I can, anyway :)
